metadata.name: Tor Client/Browser Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Tor or Tor-Browser to connect to onion routing networks

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\tor.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\tor browser\\browser\\firefox.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of Tor or Tor-Browser to connect to onion routing networks
